downloadTitle: Hosted Exchange and Lync Driving Applications Growth Edge Strategies White Paper
downloadDescription: Driving Growth with LYNC: Early Evidence of Success for Hosting Service Providers white paper by Edge Strategies.
detailsSection:
Early research indicates that Microsoft hosting service providers (HSPs) who offer Lync are experiencing the immediate benefits of higher Exchange sales and higher revenue per customer, while simultaneously preparing themselves – and their customers – for full voice-enabled unified communications as a service (UCaaS).

This document is intended to help HSPs understand the potential opportunity that they may realize by offering Lync and to provide some early insights into how to prepare for and take advantage of the emerging UCaaS opportunity based on Microsoft Lync.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
